meanings.definition: A person who studies or cultivates orchids.
meanings.sent1: The orchidists carefully tended to their beautiful flowers in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent2: Many orchidists gathered at the botanical garden to share their knowledge and passion.
meanings.sent3: The orchidists joked that their orchids were their best friends, always listening to their stories.
meanings.sent4: In the world of orchidists, each flower was a unique masterpiece waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The orchidists' dedication to their orchids was as vibrant as the colors of the blooms themselves.

meanings.sent1: The orchidists were excited to attend the orchid show together.
meanings.sent2: We met a group of orchidists who shared their experiences of growing these delicate plants.
meanings.sent3: The orchidists' club had a rule that only orchids were allowed as centerpieces at their meetings.
meanings.sent4: The orchidists' passion for their hobby bloomed brighter with each new orchid they added to their collection.
meanings.sent5: The orchidists' enthusiasm for orchids was contagious, inspiring others to join their group.
